paper_abstract: The testing of RFID information services requires a test data set of business events comprising object, aggregation, quantity and transaction events. To generate business events, we need to address the performance issues in creating a large volume of event data. This paper proposes a new model for the tag life cycle and a fast generation algorithm for this model. We present the results of experiments with the generation algorithm, showing that it outperforms previous methods.
paper_title: Generation of Business Event Data Sets for Testing RFID Information Services
